所有软件包的分层结构

软件包分层结构：
about, data, frm, main

类分层结构

  • java.lang.Object
    • about.About.TimerEv (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction (implements javax.swing.Action, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable)
      • frm.GamePane.ChangeListener
      • frm.GamePane.MoveDownListener
      • frm.GamePane.MoveLeftListener
      • frm.GamePane.MoveRightListener
      • frm.GamePane.OneMoveDownListener
    • data.Block
    • data.BlockCreater
    • java.awt.Component (implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable)
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent (implements java.io.Serializable)
          • javax.swing.JLabel (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants)
            • about.MyDongcLabel (implements java.lang.Runnable)
            • about.MyPicLabel (implements java.lang.Runnable)
          • javax.swing.JPanel (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
            • frm.BlockPane
            • frm.GamePane (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
            • frm.ImagePane
            • frm.InfoPane
        • java.awt.Window (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible)
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • about.About
          • java.awt.Frame (implements java.awt.MenuContainer)
            • javax.swing.JFrame (implements javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants)
              • frm.TetrisFrame (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
    • about.MyBorder (implements javax.swing.border.Border)
    • about.MyBorder.Dong (implements java.awt.event.ActionListener)
    • about.MyBorder.MouseE (implements java.awt.event.MouseListener)
    • data.publicData
    • main.TetrisMain
